word_mean_info__list.difference: 指需专门技术熟练技巧去完成某种复杂的任务或表演等，也指用行动把计划或打算付诸实施或执行某项命令。
和perform一样比较正式，二者意义相近，但conduct含指导、领导或监督等意味。
最普通常用词，指完成某项具体工作、任务，也指完成某种行为或动作。
指完成困难较大、较复杂的任务。较正式用词。
指履行和实现所许诺的、所期望或要求的事情，含最终完成的意味。

bilingual.target: 学生可以表演简短对话。

bilingual.source: He was invited to perform on the stage.
Pupils can then perform in front of the class.
bilingual.target: 然后学生可以在班级前表演。

bilingual.source: Pupils can perform the play in the classroom.
bilingual.target: 学生可以在教室里表演这个剧本。

bilingual.source: The actors perform together dressed in their costumes.
bilingual.target: 演员们穿着戏服一起表演。

bilingual.source: Perform your screenplays to the rest of the school in an assembly.
bilingual.target: 在集会上向全校表演你的剧本。

bilingual.source: Pupils can make their own dialogues and perform them to the class.
bilingual.target: 学生可以编写自己的对话并在班上表演。

list.abstract: Perform是一个英文单词，动词译为执行，履行，表演，扮演，进行，完成， 做，工作。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, he didn't perform stand-up comedy, he was a philosopher.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他不表演单口相声，他是个哲学家。

yingyinNormal.en: Just give me a chance to perform for you and then decide whatever you want.
yingyinNormal.zh: 给我机会为你们表演，再做最后的决定。

yingyinNormal.en: We better go. We're moving closer because our daughter's about to perform.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们得走了，要往前坐一点，因为我们的女儿要表演了。

yingyinNormal.en: But I did perform in the O2 Arena in London last week, I'm not sure if any of you were able to make that.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不过我上周确实在伦敦O2体育馆表演了，不知你们当中是否有人参加了。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, dear, dancing was Peppa's last talent. It is so nice that everyone has chosen a different talent to perform. Now, what do we have left, Peppa.
yingyinNormal.zh: 噢，糟糕，跳舞本来是佩奇的最后一项才艺。刚才你们大家表现得都很好，而且你们选择了各种不同的才艺来表演。现在还有谁没表演呢，佩奇。

yingyinNormal.en: So, what's up? Well, Penny is on her way to perform in a one-night showcase production of rent, which we are unable to attend, because we're going to a symposium on molecular positronium given by Dr. Emil Farman Farmian.
yingyinNormal.zh: 怎么了？潘妮正要去一个出租用品展示会进行表演，而我们不能去了，因为我们要去参加由伊米尔·法尔曼法尔米安博士主讲的关于分子正负的研讨会。

yingyinNormal.en: Interesting hypothesis. Let's apply the scientific method, perform an experiment.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这假设有意思，套用科学的方法做实验证明吧。

yingyinNormal.en: That decision only seems subjective. In reality, people in a wedding party perform very specific functions, and some will perform those better than others.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那个决定只是看似主观而已。但实际上，婚宴上的人都有着十分明确的功用，而某些人的发挥就是会比别人强。

yingyinNormal.en: And I would actually perform medical procedures when he'd leave me in the office.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我还得替他处理医疗事务当他不在的时候。

yingyinNormal.en: That's impossible. I could perform an operation on you and prove it if you'd like.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不可能，我可以给你动个手术，向你证明。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm a bit of an expert at drumming. That's good shake, rattle and banging. Now perform.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我现在可是很擅长打鼓了。很不错的沙沙咯咯梆梆协奏曲，现在开始演奏吧。

yingyinNormal.en: We contract for DOP, NASA, JPL you name it. You perform here, doors open for you anywhere.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们和航空航天局，喷气推进实验室等等都有合同，你在这干，前途无量。

yingyinNormal.en: As far as I can tell, yes. Did you order Mr. Moody to perform these actions? No, I did not.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在我看来是的。是你下令让穆迪先生这么做的吗？不，我没有。

yingyinNormal.en: Great, well, who's it going to be? I'll do it, provided I can perform the ceremony in Klingon. No.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不错，那谁来当证婚人呢？我来吧，前提是得让用克林贡语主持仪式。没门儿。

yingyinNormal.en: But I'm afraid, my dear, the excessive bleeding from the birth forced us to perform a hysterectomy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但恐怕因为生产造成大量失血，我们不得不切除子宫。

yingyinNormal.en: No. No. It's a real thing. Anyone can get ordained on the Internet and perform like weddings and stuff.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是真的，任何人都能在网络上被任命为牧师，然后证婚。

yingyinNormal.en: They were powered by circuit boards as big as your hand, and they could only perform basic arithmetic. Then came Intel.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们使用电路板提供动力，只能运行最基本的算术，然后因特尔就出现了。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm going to bring my six-year-old daughter to watch you perform tonight, because I want her to see that Asians can be inspiring.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我要把我六岁的女儿带来，今晚，带她来看你的演出，因为我想让她看见，亚洲人也可以激励人。

yingyinNormal.en: And I succeed. I perform my first surprise, illegal high wire walk. This is also the first time I get the taste of this sensation.
yingyinNormal.zh: 结果成功了，我进行了第一次出人意料的非法高空走钢索，我也第一次尝到那种兴奋的滋味。

yingyinNormal.en: It's Sol 135 now. We need 13 days to mount the boosters, perform inspections which gives Bruce and his team 47 days to make this probe.
yingyinNormal.zh: 现在是第135太阳日，我们需要13天来搭建助推器，进行检查，也就是布鲁斯和他的团队有47天来做飞行器。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 执行者；演员；表演者；演奏者；演出者
n. 演出；表演；履行；执行；完成；表现；饰演；工作情况；言语行为；性能
v. 执行任务；完成...；实施行动；履行职责；演出；表演；（perform的现在分词）
v. 做得比…好；比…回报更高

word_family.mean: v. 执行；完成；实施；履行；演出；表演；工作；表现；运行

examination_example.sentence: The thought of holding a fixed grin as the camera <highlight>performed</highlight> its magical duties was too much to contemplate.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当摄像机执行其神奇的任务时，一想到要保持一个固定的笑容，就令人难以想象。

examination_example.sentence: In short, these are the types of jobs that machines can <highlight>perform</highlight> much better at than human beings.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 简而言之，这些是机器比人类更擅长的工作类型。

examination_example.sentence: They are designed to <highlight>perform</highlight> very predictable activities.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它们被设计来执行非常可预测的活动。

examination_example.sentence: Students who take a gap year are generally better prepared for and <highlight>perform</highlight> better in college than those who do not.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 选择间隔年的学生通常比未选择间隔年的学生对大学生活准备更充分，其在校表现也更好。

examination_example.sentence: Over 40 different sets of criteria have been measured to get a more rounded assessment of how countries are <highlight>performing</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 已对40多套不同的标准进行了衡量，以更全面地评估各国的表现。

examination_example.sentence: What about the students who <highlight>performed</highlight> well on the tests and did their homework?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那些在考试中表现良好并且完成家庭作业的学生呢？

sense_info_list.en: present a form of entertainment to an audience

examination_example.sentence: The Sydney Symphony Orchestra <highlight>performed</highlight> a reworked version of Antonio Vivaldi's The Four Seasons.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 悉尼交响乐团演奏了安东尼奥·维瓦尔第的《四季》的改编版本。

examination_example.sentence: These new forms were at first mainly written by scholars and <highlight>performed</highlight> by amateurs.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些新形式起初主要由学者编写，由业余爱好者表演。

word_usage.usage:
perform可用作及物动词，也可用作不及物动词。用作及物动词时接名词或代词作宾语。作“表演”解时，还可接双宾语，其间接宾语由for引出。作“演奏”解时，表示乐器的名词由介词at或on引出。
例：to perform on the flute 吹奏长笛。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 表演; 主持; 表现

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 执行者；演员；表演者；演奏者；演出者

v. 做得比…好；比…回报更高

sense_info_list.en: present a form of entertainment to an audience
sense_info_list.zh: 表演; 主持; 表现

examination_example.sentence: Experience of <highlight>performing</highlight> multiple roles.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 担任多个角色的经验。

examination_example.sentence: And, by virtue of that heightened motivation, to <highlight>perform</highlight> well.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 并且，凭借这种更高的动力，表现出色。

examination_example.sentence: It's quite possible they're content with how the individuals they promoted are now <highlight>performing</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们很可能对自己提拔的员工现在的表现感到满意。

examination_example.sentence: Instead, they <highlight>perform</highlight> routine and laborious tasks, freeing nurses up to attend to patients with immediate needs.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是，他们执行常规和繁重的任务，让护士腾出时间来照顾有即时需求的病人。

examination_example.sentence: "An ultimate face recognition algorithm should <highlight>perform</highlight> with billions of people in a data set, " the researchers wrote.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究人员写道: “最终的面部识别算法应该能处理数十亿人的数据集。”

examination_example.sentence: Certainly, there're benefits to a college major beyond the job a student can <highlight>perform</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当然，对毕业生来说，念大学的好处不仅仅在于能胜任工作。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 表演; 主持; 表现

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 执行者；演员；表演者；演奏者；演出者
n. 演出；表演；履行；执行；完成；表现；饰演；工作情况；言语行为；性能
v. 做得比…好；比…回报更高

word_family.mean: v. 执行；完成；实施；履行；演出；表演；工作；表现；运行

sense_info_list.en: present a form of entertainment to an audience
sense_info_list.zh: 表演; 主持; 表现

examination_example.sentence: But among those who stayed on, the close losers <highlight>performed</highlight> even better than the narrow winners.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但在那些剩下的人里，差点成功的失败者甚至比险胜者还优秀。

examination_example.sentence: There's a widespread misunderstanding that only low <highlight>performing</highlight> children suffer from math anxiety.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 普遍的误解是只有成绩差的孩子才会患上数学焦虑症。

examination_example.sentence: The reasons kids in Jose <highlight>performed</highlight> so well might seem obvious.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 何塞的孩子表现如此出色的原因似乎是显而易见的。

examination_example.sentence: Doctors <highlight>performed</highlight> surgery and removed the bone.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 医生们进行了手术并取出了骨头。

examination_example.sentence: When babies expectations are violated in experiments like the ones <highlight>performed</highlight> with the cats, they react much like their animal friends.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当像在猫咪身上进行的实验一样，当违反婴儿的预期时，它们的反应就像动物朋友一样。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>

examination_example.sentence: In 1844 they bought it for $1,200 and some land from Charles Dresser, who <highlight>performed</highlight> their marriage ceremony in 1842.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 1844年，他们以1200美元加上一些土地，从Charles Dresser处买下它，Charles Dresser是1842年他们婚礼的主婚人。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Performing</highlight> in his own style.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 以他自己的风格表演。

examination_example.sentence: Charlotte Stone will <highlight>perform</highlight> songs from her new best-selling CD, with James Pickering on the piano.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 夏洛特·斯通将演唱她最新畅销CD中的歌曲，詹姆斯·皮克林将在钢琴上演奏。

examination_example.sentence: The project also resulted in a reduction in the amount of medicines used to <highlight>perform</highlight> medical-imaging (医学影像) procedures.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该项目还减少了用于执行医学影像程序的药物数量。

examination_example.sentence: They were <highlight>performing</highlight> a calculation, not just memorizing the value of each combination.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它们正在进行计算，而不仅仅是记住每个组合的数值。

数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: People often <highlight>perform</highlight> it the night before the Chinese New Year.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人们经常在农历新年的前一天晚上表演它。

examination_example.sentence: A group of children <highlight>perform</highlight> A Cat's Mind.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一群孩子表演《猫的心灵》。

examination_example.sentence: He got a lot of chances to <highlight>perform</highlight> in movies.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他有很多机会在电影中表演。

examination_example.sentence: She and her teammates <highlight>performed</highlight> different kinds of experiments.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她和她的队友进行了不同类型的实验。

examination_example.sentence: How well did they <highlight>perform</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们表现如何？

examination_example.sentence: Firemen know how to <highlight>perform</highlight> rescues safely.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 消防员知道如何安全地进行救援。
